title: Bug!!!
body: I didn't get the chest with garen and ashe? im lvl 7 now but previously on my NA account i got it at a earlier lvl. I think its just a bug. Is there anything that anyone can do to help.

replies.body: Sometimes it just takes awhile for those items to show up. Try giving your client a quick refresh and let me know if you see it!
You gave me another skin chest xD. could you try again pls, i need the blue essence.
Eep! Looks like that was the wrong chest actually lol! Check again and you should have the right one this time since I added it manually.
